label: Converter
name: YOLO to OD1 Format Converter
description: Converts YOLO detection format to OD1 format with zone assignment capabilities

conversion_mapping.transform: bbox + confidence + class_id -> bbox + confidence + zone_name

use_cases: Converting YOLO detections for zone-based analysis
Preparing detections for tracking systems that expect OD1 format
Adding spatial context (zones) to raw detection outputs

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score to include detection

class_filter.description: List of class IDs to include (empty = all classes)

notes: Essential converter for bridging YOLO-based detectors with zone-aware tracking and analysis systems
